lines: Now, now Echidna. Be a dear and face me you coward!
You're a fool messsing with me you sssly bassstard.
Your henchmens are no match for me.
You and your white beard under essstimate my powersss.
I have made more alliesss and they will do my bidding.
Ha. You're a giant fool. Now on your knees if you wish to beg for mercy!
